formatDescription: Windows Media Video 9 Advanced Profile or WVC1 is a fuly compliant Advanced Profile of the VC-1 codec standard.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 11/2023 (v.115)- Renamed to avoid repitition in version and name. Updated description and signature note field. Modified the offset values in the internal signature from null to 0 as part of a project to match PRONOM data with the xsd standard. Internally researched.
